text:
Just finished reading RedHat white paper "Writing greener Java applications". 20 pages worth reading that explain the what and the how.
It talks about 2 important things:
- Efficiency: CPU and RAM consumes electricity.
- Don't run unused instances

1/3
https://t.co/8GEscNtwRD
